scripts.build: pulp build && npm run example-todo && npm run example-ajax && npm run example-effects && rimraf docs && pulp docs
scripts.example-todo: bower link && cd examples/todo && bower link purescript-optic-ui && npm run build
scripts.example-ajax: bower link && cd examples/ajax && bower link purescript-optic-ui && npm run build
scripts.example-effects: bower link && cd examples/effects && bower link purescript-optic-ui && npm run build
